name: Bengaluru Marriott Hotel Whitefield

reviews.text: Stayed here one week in June and just returned from 2 week stay in July.
reviews.title: BEST STAY EVER!
Definitely will stay here next time
reviews.text: Let me start by just saying that this has to be my favorite Hotel ever--The entire staff is outstanding! Got to chat with GM Mathew Copper and I understand how he inspires the staff to the highest standard of Customer Service!
Having had issues with food and water during previous trips to India, the cleanliness and infrastructure of the Marriott erased my worries (RO water filtration system!)
reviews.title: Awesome!

reviews.text: Breakfast in the M Cafe was a fine start to every day; the staff is always smiling and running to assist you, the selection is endless and the fresh juices rock.
reviews.title: Great hotel with excellent food

reviews.text: I want to give special recognition to the Alto Vino Italian restaurant where the food is marvelous and Chef Alfonso Montefusco is the BEST. He and his staff spoiled me and my colleagues with special dishes and the most delightful service.
reviews.title: Best yet in Whitefield

reviews.text: The Marriott in Whitefield is a very impressive hotel. I have used it both for business and for pleasure. I held a very important business meeting at the Marriott several weeks back, and I was blown away by the level of service I was provided. The room was exceptional and the service was top of the line. We had everything we needed and were very well taken care of throughout the day. Several of my colleagues said that this was the best offsite experience they have had in Bangalore. If you are looking for a place to hold your next meeting, give the Marriott a try. I thought we got great value for the money and a great location for the team to get our work done. In addition to the business aspect, I have eaten at the Marriott several times, including Sunday Brunch and dinner at the new Italian restaurant, Alto Vino. Both have been great experiences. The food is always good, and the service has also been exceptional. We have lived in Bangalore for two years now, and hands down, I have had the most consistent and pleasing experiences at the Marriott in Whitefield.
reviews.title: Top Notch Hotel ... Don't Miss It

reviews.text: My first visit to India made even more enjoyable by the management and colleagues of this newly built first class hotel.
reviews.title: Marriot Hotel Bangalore

reviews.text: Typically Marriot and a brand that you can trust with confidence.
reviews.title: Highly recommended hotel in Whitefiled

reviews.text: Being mindful of stories of food challenges, I was always concious of culinary cautions..... however, that was soon disposed of as the quality and variety of cuisine has contributed to me gaining, not losing weight.......First class food and in an excellent ambience.
reviews.title: A new experience

reviews.text: From the front desk (Vini the duty manager when I arrived) the ladies and gents in the M Cafe for a smorgesbord of breakfast and evening buffet (Santosh, Deepak, Needhu, Shalini, Rohan, Sushmita) and the guys in the Alto Vino...you know who you are Amandeep, Ramul, Ganesh, the wonderful Manisha and all the team...who I know went over and above to ensure my meals were just right.
reviews.title: Excellent option for Whitefield area

reviews.text: Wow!! Amazing room service!!
reviews.title: Great stay in Whitefield!!

reviews.text: None of their restaurants had pizza in dinner menu but chef especially made it for us and highly customised with arugula leaves on it...
reviews.title: Solid Hotel Choice in the Whitefield area
Great hotel
reviews.text: Then our breakfast buffet was a treat especially when chef Rohan got a pan cake of letters naming my kid..

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I recommend this place
reviews.title: Classy, elegant and up to speed...in India...good internet is priceless!

reviews.text: Having sampled many hotels in Bangalore, I think the Marriott in Whitefield is the best combination of luxury and value. The hotel was opened in April 2013 and has all the amenities one would hope for while in Bangalore. The hotel restaurant was a good choice for breakfast and dinner. I was surprised they didn't serve hot dinner items until 7 PM, but the menu had a nice mix of items and the buffet had a wide range of international options. The staff was willing to accommodate special requests for food so the menu listed could grow to accommodate your tastes.
reviews.title: Great hotel, Excellent breakfast
Great New Hotel
reviews.text: Had a wonderful stay at this new Marriott. Great to see how my favorite chain sees the latest in room design and facilities. What they have come up with is excellent. I enjoyed a very spacious room with contemporary bathroom, amazing bed and pleasant glass desk. As for facilities, the breakfast buffet is relaxed with a wonderful selection, the Alto Vino Italian Restaurant has a pleasant vibe and excellent food and the lobby coffe shop (Whiefield Bakery) top notch coffee and very fresh pastries. All staff are happy and greet you with a smile. Overall a very pleasant experience

From airport pick up to drop off a week later I cannot fault this hotel for the level of service and commitment of the staff to delvier. It was not 100% smooth, on one occasion a car picknig me up went to the wrong place, but the effort put in by the staff to rectify it and mae me happy afterward was top-notch.
reviews.title: Service up at the top levels

reviews.text: The hotel is new and feels it, with a comfortable bar area, good range of drinks and two restaurants - only one of which I ate in. The club luonge is relaxed (although they did paly Christmas music one day in there which was a tad bizarre!) with good range of food and adequate drinks, served with a smile.
reviews.title: Very nice facility with true Hospitality and excellent Service

reviews.text: My room was on the 12th floor, with good view of the city and toward the nearby lake, large comfortable bed, similar lfat screen TV and DVD player, cable films and TV plus a good side work desk and very good working internet. Remote access to work was excellent from the room. Good size bathroom and great shower.
reviews.title: Hotel is good but the food is below average

reviews.text: Breakfast was a treat - good range of local and western foods.
reviews.title: Outstanding property and service

description: Bengaluru Marriott Hotel Whitefield blends contemporary style and warmth to provide premium accommodation for the business and leisure traveler. Located next to Inorbit Mall and Sri Satya Sai Super Speciality Hospital. The hotel offers 324 rooms, including 17 suites. Located 50 minutes from the Bengaluru International Airport & 30 minutes from the city centre.
